roleset.name: to subject to a penalty
roleset.note: PENALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'penalize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from penalize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The government will penalize offenders , but wo n't confiscate property .

example.name: passive
example.text: Returns for 1988 from people with six-month filing extensions were due Monday , but the IRS says [0] [people in the disaster areas]-1 wo n't be penalized [*-1] or late filing if their returns are marked [*-2] `` Hugo '' and postmarked by Jan. 16 .
example.arg: if their returns are marked [*-2] `` Hugo '' and postmarked by Jan. 16
